Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Variations on Unser dummer Pöbel meint, KV 455

1784 · KV1,2,3,6 455

[IMSLP]

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/26 · BA 4525-01 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Kurt von Fischer [including first version]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5746 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Kurt von Fischer [including first version]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4780 · ed. Kurt von Fischer
  • Henle · HN 116 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • Henle · HN 117 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • Henle · HN 189 · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • Könemann · K 112 · Variationen · ed. István Máriássy [including first version]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50009 · Variationen für Klavier / Band 2 · ed. Hans-Christian Müller

Final version

The theme, from Christoph Willibald Gluck’s opera La Rencontre imprévue ou Les Pèlerins de Mecque (known to Mozart in its German translation Die unvermuthete Zusammenkunft oder Die Pilgrime von Mekka), is followed by ten variations.

Duration: 14'

Difficulty: 3

First version

The variations also exist in an earlier, incomplete version with five variations. The first, second, third and (incomplete) fifth variations correspond to the first, second, third and eighth variations respectively in the final version, whilst the fourth variation is not found in the final version.

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3
